short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add state of workitem before the AzureDevops link in Confluence

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On Atlassian Confluence, 
this extension will add informations about work items and queries if your backlog is on AzureDevops.

This will add a label in front of the work item link in the page.
You can also use a tag instead of a link to have the label with the state or board-column of the workitem.

Another option :
You can see the workitems results of queries before the queries links

With the mouse over the label, you can see information about assignment, story point and more.
